p.k: While playing a game with Hoodie and Lola, Pat accidentally breaks the television. Lola says it was her fault to protect her faithful friend. Her father scolds her and reminds her she has to behave if Santa Claus is going to visit this year. Pat panics: he couldn't bear to see his best friend deprived of Christmas presents. As the days pass, he does everything in his power to keep Lola out of trouble. Just when he thinks the hardest is done, the Guanos kidnap Santa Claus. Pat has to use all his skills to thwart the ruthless birds’ plans and to ensure Santa distributes his gifts. To Lola’s great delight.
